attributes.review: When downloading this app, I was expecting the daily gospel of the leader of this great and free nation! After the excruciatingly long download time (4 whole weeks!) I finally opened the app. I was quickly met by the smiling face of our supreme leader asking me to put in my phone number, which I happily obliged to do. The app kept asking me questions like my name, birthdate, and email. I started to get suspicious when it asked for my social security number and bank PIN but I went ahead with it because I know that there is no way that our Great President Trump would ever would allow anything horrible to happen to my data. Everything was peachy until 2 weeks later when I got an urgent notice from my bank saying that all my funds had been depleted and my information had been completely wiped and replaced. Turns out, the app is developed and run by leftest CHINA, who stole all my information! Not only that, but last night I received a notification from the app to make a left turn right away. Of course, being a good American, I followed the orders of my president. It led me down an ally way where I stumbled across the scene of brutal massacre. Just as I realized what I was looking at, SWAT officers busted in and attempted to arrest me as I was the only one on the scene of the crime. Before I could react, my Siri activated and began saying “ACAB 1312 ACAB” on repeat. It even turned into a taser and attacked the officers! As it was decimating the officers, I ran away in fear. Now, I am the most wanted criminal in Alabama!
attributes.title: Nice try but next time 🧚💖✨ Don’t
